physicalCharacteristics.exactSizeAndDimensions: This T-shirt features a standard relaxed fit with dimensions suitable for adult wearers. The length from the shoulder to the hem is approximately 28 inches, with a chest width of about 22 inches, providing a comfortable drape over the body.
physicalCharacteristics.colorScheme: The primary color of the T-shirt is a deep matte black, serving as a backdrop for vibrant splatters of blue, red, yellow, and white paint. These splatters are randomly placed, creating a unique pattern on each shirt.
physicalCharacteristics.materialComposition: Made from a high-quality, soft cotton blend, this T-shirt offers both comfort and durability. The fabric is lightweight yet substantial, ideal for both casual wear and artistic statement pieces.
physicalCharacteristics.shapeAndForm: The T-shirt has a classic round neckline and short sleeves. The overall shape is boxy with a slight taper towards the hem to fit naturally on the torso, promoting a casual yet stylish appearance.
physicalCharacteristics.brandingElements: The front of the T-shirt prominently displays the phrase 'HOLLERY DEYY.' in bold, slightly distressed white typography centered just below the collar.

visualDetails.surfaceFinish: The surface of the T-shirt has a soft, smooth texture typical of high-quality cotton. The paint splatters add a slight raised texture to the touch.
visualDetails.distinctiveFeatures: The most distinctive features of this T-shirt are the bright, multicolored paint splatters and the bold 'HOLLERY DEYY.' text. Each splatter is uniquely shaped, ensuring no two shirts are exactly alike.
visualDetails.lightingInteraction: The matte finish of the black fabric minimizes reflections, while the glossy paint splatters catch and reflect light, enhancing their visibility and color vibrancy under various lighting conditions.

contextualInformation.useCase: Ideal for casual outings, artistic events, or as a statement piece in a trendy, casual wardrobe. Suitable for all seasons.
contextualInformation.targetAudience: Young adults and teenagers who appreciate urban fashion and statement clothing.
contextualInformation.keySellingPoints: Unique design with each piece having a one-of-a-kind paint splatter pattern, comfortable fabric, versatile styling options, and bold branding that appeals to a fashion-forward demographic.

veo3Consistency.productPlacement: Ensure the T-shirt is fully visible with the front facing outward. The text and splatters should be clearly visible in each scene.
veo3Consistency.lightingRequirements: Soft, diffuse lighting to reduce glare on the paint splatters and ensure the black fabric appears true to color without washing out the details.
veo3Consistency.cameraAngles: Frontal view to highlight the text and splatter pattern, a close-up on the splatter details, and a three-quarter view to showcase the fit and form.
veo3Consistency.interactionGuidelines: Characters should wear the T-shirt in a relaxed manner, possibly pairing it with casual, stylish bottoms to emphasize the T-shirtâ€™s urban appeal.

demonstrationSuggestions: model walking in an urban environment
close-up shots while the model interacts with art
casual conversation scenes in social settings
